title: Risqué Business
description: Risqué Business is the first episode in the steamy encounters of Tania Fye which finds her in a business meeting with a twist.Steve Collins has been one of Tania’s on off lovers for almost a year. As Director of the TV company that hosts her sex toys on their late night XXX shopping channel, Steve pops in once a month to bring her up to date on sales figures. Sales figures are not the only thing on his mind Tania’s figure is also on the menu.This steamy office encounter is not your everyday business meeting and things can get quite Risqué.
author: Amanda Carrington
